# airbyte Provider

airbyte-api: Programatically control Airbyte Cloud.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    airbyte = {
      source  = "airbytehq/airbyte"
      version = "0.2.0"
    }
  }
}

provider "airbyte" {
  # Configuration options
}
```
